default.title: Welcome!
default.content: This is a short guide to get you know how to use this system. Press arrow right on your keyboard to continue.

default.title: The Menu
default.content: This is the menu list for you to navigate through feature exists in this system.

default.title: Account Settings
default.content: You may click here to go to update your account, change your password, or logout from the system.

default.title: Activate The Guide
default.content: Whenever you get lost, you may activate the guide by clicking this button. Try to click this button yourself after this guide closed.

index.title: Dashboard
index.content: This is the dashboard where everything is simplify summarized.

index.title: Monthly Stats
index.content: This is a very simplified monthly stats on your system.

index.title: Monthly Working Clock
index.content: This is the average or median of Working Clock for current month.

index.title: Monthly Working Clock
index.content: Working Clock is a running timer for an open ticket where the timer is NOT on a PENDING state.

index.title: Total Users
index.content: This is the all-time total users registered in the system. This one only visible for super admin.

index.title: Charts
index.content: These are charts which showing you the last 7 days of total clock timer and ticket submitted.

tickets.content: You may click here to open a new ticket.
When a ticket successfully opened, you'll see the ticket appear on this list here.
You can view and also edit a ticket by clicking on this eye button.
To delete a ticket, simply click on this trash button.
By default, newest ticket will appear first on the list. You can click here to sort the ticket between newest or oldest.
You can also sort the ticket list by clicking on other table header which has arrow icon when you hover it. Such as this ticket no.
You can also do quick filter to the ticket list as by default, all tickets will appear on the list.

tickets.title: Advanced Search
tickets.content: You can also open the advanced search to filter the result to be more precise.

tickets.title: Show/Hide Table Columns
tickets.content: Click here to show or hide table columns from the list.

tickets.create.title: Customer
tickets.create.content: Select customer for this ticket. Note that * mark indicates required field.

tickets.create.title: Remote Location
tickets.create.content: Select remote location. These shown remote locations are based on customer you've selected beforehand.

tickets.create.title: Title (Optional)
tickets.create.content: This ticket title is optional to be filled.

tickets.create.title: Down Time Causer
tickets.create.content: Select down time causer. This needs to be selected to determine service availability on the report page.

tickets.create.title: Auto Start Timer
tickets.create.content: When you left this to be ticked, right after you create this ticket, the OPEN clock timer will automatically started.

tickets.create.title: Create The Ticket
tickets.create.content: Last, click on this button to create the ticket.

tickets.show.content: This is the ticket detail you have created beforehand.

tickets.show.title: Ticket No.
tickets.show.content: Whenever a ticket created, it will has a ticket number automatically generated.

tickets.show.title: Action
tickets.show.content: Click this button to edit or delete a ticket. Note: you have to have a given permission to edit or delete a ticket.

tickets.show.title: Ticket Clock/Timer
tickets.show.content: These are the ticket timers which divided into three states. Open, pending, and start clock/timer.

tickets.show.title: Open Clock
tickets.show.content: Open clock counts the first time ticket open (or first timer started) until you pause the timer.

tickets.show.title: Pending Clock
tickets.show.content: Once you pause the timer, this pending clock will start to count. Until you start the timer again.

tickets.show.title: Start Clock
tickets.show.content: After you start the timer again, this start clock will be running to count.

tickets.show.title: Update Timer State
tickets.show.content: Use this button to update timer state. A popup where you can put a note of things related to the next state will appear after you click on this button.

tickets.show.title: Notes/Progress
tickets.show.content: Right after you update the timer state, the note you've submitted each update will appear on this note/progress area.

tickets.show.title: Clock Status
tickets.show.content: This is the current clock status. It will be either OPEN, PENDING, STARTED, or COMPLETED.

tickets.show.title: Ticket Status
tickets.show.content: This is the current ticket status. It will be either OPEN or CLOSED. Once the ticket CLOSED, you can not do anything with the timer.

users.content: You can click here to register a new user.
This is the list of registered users on this system.
You can view a user detail by clicking on this eye button.
You can edit a user detail by clicking on this pencil button.
Click here to change user's password.
To delete a user, simply click on this trash button. Note: The first user can not be deleted.
By default, oldest user will appear first on the list. You can click here to sort the user between newest or oldest.
You can also sort the user list by clicking on other table header which has arrow icon when you hover it. Such as this user name.
You can also do quick filter to the user list as by default, all users will appear on the list.

users.title: Advanced Search
users.content: You can also open the advanced search to filter the result to be more precise.

users.title: Show/Hide Table Columns
users.content: Click here to show or hide table columns from the list.

user-access.content: This is the roles available in your system.
You can create a new role and assign permission to it afterward.
To update a role's permission, click on the role first, then edit its permission on the permission list.
You can also edit or delete a role by clicking on this pencil button. Note: The first role can not be deleted; You have to have correct permission to be able to edit or delete.
Tick the permission name to assign a permission to the selected role.
When you're done tweaking permissions for selected role, save the change by clicking this button.

customers.content: You can click here to create a customer.
This is the list of registered customers on this system.
You can view and also edit a customer by clicking on this eye button.

customers.title: Remote Locations
customers.content: View remote location under this customer by clicking on this button.
To delete a customer, simply click on this trash button. Note: whenever you delete a customer, all corresponding remote, tickets and reports would also be deleted.
By default, oldest customer will appear first on the list. You can click here to sort the customer between newest or oldest.
You can also sort the customer list by clicking on other table header which has arrow icon when you hover it. Such as this customer name.
You can also do quick filter to the customer list as by default, all customers will appear on the list.

customers.title: Advanced Search
customers.content: You can also open the advanced search to filter the result to be more precise.

customers.title: Show/Hide Table Columns
customers.content: Click here to show or hide table columns from the list.

remote-locations.content: You can click here to create a remote location.
This is the list of registered remote locations on this system.
You can view and also edit a remote location by clicking on this eye button.
To delete a remote location, simply click on this trash button. Note: whenever you delete a remote location, all corresponding tickets and reports would also be deleted.
By default, oldest remote location will appear first on the list. You can click here to sort the remote location between newest or oldest.
You can also sort the remote location list by clicking on other table header which has arrow icon when you hover it. Such as this terminal name.
You can also do quick filter to the remote location list as by default, all remote locations will appear on the list.

remote-locations.title: Advanced Search
remote-locations.content: You can also open the advanced search to filter the result to be more precise.

remote-locations.title: Show/Hide Table Columns
remote-locations.content: Click here to show or hide table columns from the list.

reports.content: This is the list of summarized report for tickets for each terminal/remote location.
You can sort the report list by clicking on table header which has arrow icon when you hover it. Such as this terminal name.
This report is showing based on month you selected here.
You can also filter the result to only show report for specific customer as selected here.

reports.title: Show/Hide Table Columns
reports.content: Click here to show or hide table columns from the list.
You can click here to export report. Take a note that this export produces results based on filter you've selected.
